solution_line_template: Danai places {skulls} skulls + {broomsticks} broomsticks + {spiderwebs} spiderwebs + {cauldron} cauldron = <<{skulls}+{broomsticks}+{spiderwebs}+{cauldron}={initial_decorations}>>{initial_decorations} decorations.
She also puts up twice as many pumpkins around the house as she put spiderwebs, {spiderwebs} x {multiplier_for_twice} = <<{spiderwebs}*{multiplier_for_twice}={pumpkins}>>{pumpkins} pumpkins.
Danai will also add {budget_decorations} + {left_to_put_up} decorations to the {initial_decorations} + {pumpkins} decorations already up = {total_decorations} total decorations Danai will put up.
